item.title: 众议员劳伦-博伯特（Lauren Boebert）正在科罗拉多州的一个新选区竞选国会议员，她带来了130万美元的竞选资金和知名度。她的名气可能会在一场拥挤的竞选中有所帮助，但这也成了祸不单行。
item.description: Rep. Lauren Boebert is running for Congress in a new Colorado district, bringing a $1.3 million war chest and name recognition. Her fame could help in a crowded race, but it has become as much of a curse as a blessing. on.wsj.com/3UMiMhp on.wsj.com/3UMiMhp

item.title: 在 Tory Burch 辞去首席执行官一职，专注于品牌设计之后，时尚作家们认为这家公司现在很酷。"Burch 说："看到全新的顾客真是太好了。
item.description: After Tory Burch stepped down as chief executive to focus on designing for the brand, fashion writers deemed the company cool now. “It’s wonderful to see a whole new customer,” Burch says. on.wsj.com/3uvVCRL on.wsj.com/3uvVCRL

item.title: 泰格-伍兹（Tiger Woods）最近一次简短的复出展示了他的局限性，同时也让人看到了昔日的神奇魅力。

item.title:

👟 两双耐克罕见的 Air Mag "回到未来 "鞋

item.description:

item.title: 16 支黄油、20 杯面粉、36 枚鸡蛋：这些都是煎饼公主一天的工作。下面就是她的具体做法。
item.description: Sixteen sticks of butter, 20 cups of flour, 36 eggs: It's all in a day's blogging for the Pancake Princess. Here's exactly how she does it. on.wsj.com/3UJNJTk on.wsj.com/3UJNJTk

item.title: 我们的专栏作家来到世界升级之都，计划接受几乎所有的倒卖。以下是她的花费--以及她认为值得的花费。
item.description: Our columnist travels to the world capital of upgrades with a plan to accept almost every upsell. Here's what it cost—and what she thought was worth it. on.wsj.com/3T3BgZz on.wsj.com/3T3BgZz

item.title: 即使聊天机器人或虚拟助理实际上并没有感情，但以苛刻或辱骂的方式称呼它可以吗？以下是《华尔街日报》读者的看法。
item.description: Is it OK to address a chatbot or virtual assistant in a manner that is harsh or abusive—even though it doesn’t actually have feelings? Here's what WSJ readers think. on.wsj.com/42IGahz on.wsj.com/42IGahz

item.title: 找到正确的工作节奏很难，尤其是在远程工作时。有时我们工作得太慢，有时又太快。如何利用技术来帮助我们？
item.description: Finding the right pacing for work is hard—especially when working remotely. Sometimes we work too slowly; sometimes too fast. How to use technology to help. on.wsj.com/3woryYV on.wsj.com/3woryYV

item.title: Meir Soloveichik 写道："华盛顿穿过特拉华河 "这幅画是美国的标志，但仔细观察就会发现它比我们想象的要复杂得多，也更有意义。
item.description: The painting "Washington Crossing the Delaware" is an American icon, but a close look reveals it's more complicated and meaningful than we think, writes Meir Soloveichik on.wsj.com/42MaJTB on.wsj.com/42MaJTB

item.title:
"一名手持AR-15步枪的男子闯入我的学校，杀害了我的18名同学、两名老师和我"。
"我的身体被战争武器摧毁"
"那天我死了"
议员们开始接到一群孩子的电话 他们的死讯令人惊讶
item.description:
"A man with an AR-15 came into my school and killed 18 of my classmates, two teachers and me."

"My body was destroyed by a weapon of war.”

"I died that day."

Lawmakers are starting to get calls from a surprising group of kids—dead ones. on.wsj.com/3wqyF36

item.title: 一位精神科医生下载了一款赌博应用程序，以便在晚上放松心情。赌博公司让她不断下注，直到她输掉 40 多万美元。"你就是无法自拔"
item.description: A psychiatrist downloaded a gambling app to unwind at night. Gambling companies kept her betting until she lost more than $400,000. “You just can’t get out.” on.wsj.com/42HTFyg

item.description: An unlikely insult has emerged on the 2024 presidential campaign trail: “Herbert Hoover” on.wsj.com/49aWj1T

item.title: 北约就像一张美元钞票：它的价值取决于人们对它的信任。现在，这种信念正受到唐纳德-特朗普的攻击。
item.description: NATO is like a dollar bill: Its value rests on the faith people put in it. Now that faith is under attack from Donald Trump. on.wsj.com/3SLkoFn on.wsj.com/3SLkoFn
